IAN'S VISION
We are in the battle for the future and the soul of Calgary. We choose hope over fear. Truth and transparency over lies. And unity over division. We treat each other with dignity, we leave nobody behind, and we give hate no safe harbour.
This is what Ian believes in.
A perfect representation of hard working Calgarians...
Father of 3, Husband, Oil and gas engineer, Immigrant.
Read Ian's story
